data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3580556,"name":"Nevan Shively","username":"Nshives","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/e79b87/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-04-05T02:41:11.416Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe are trying to switch our code over from using NavX as our IMU to a pigeon 2. Our NavX wasn’t working super great so currently we are just using it for setting the limelight IMU at the beginning of the match but we would like to use the Pigeon in place of both of these. Our previous code for resetting and taring the gyro was a bit complex for the NavX, and we are getting errors with just switching out the gyro instance. Is there a simple way to get the same functionality with the Pigeon or do we need to still do all the same stuff? Attached are the problems we are having.\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"lightbox-wrapper\"\u003e\u003ca class=\"lightbox\"
